Title: ESKAPE pathogen inhibition
Description: Chemprop D-MPNN predicts antimicrobial potential (AUC 0.823) for 29,537 compounds against antibiotic-resistant Burkholderia cenocepacia. Successfully screens FDA drugs (26%) and natural products (12%) from a list of >200k compounds..
Interpretation: Probability that a compound inhibits bacterial pathogens with a focus on ESKAPE. Scores range from 0 to 1. With 1 indicating the highest probability for growth inhibitory activity.
